newsitem.title: EU: EP ENVIRONMENT COMMITTEE AGENDA - NOV 19-20-21.
newsitem.headline: EP ENVIRONMENT COMMITTEE AGENDA - NOV 19-20-21.

text.p: Committee on the Environment, Public Health and Consumer Protection [[ Tuesday 19 November 1996 ]] ===] Tuesday, 19 November 1996, 3.00pm 1. Adoption of draft agenda (PE219.880 ) 2. Approval of minutes of meeting of: - 29/30 October 1996 (PE220.152 ) 3. Chairman's announcements 4. Oral question n. 20/95 by Mr Lucas Pires and Mr Florenz on the protection o f waterways in Spain and Portugal (DVR0404 ) 5. Forests: protection against atmospheric pollution and fires (T04463) (T04463) CNS96185 COM(96)0341 C4-0476/96 + ENVI Fond R COLLINS Kenneth D. (PSE) (PE219.873 ) + ENVI Fond COLLINS Kenneth D. (PSE) (PE219.873 ) - Consideration of draft report 6. Veterinary checks (amendment of Directives 71/118, 72/462, 85/73, 91/67, 91/ 492, 91/493, 92/45 and 92/118) (T04873) (T04873) CNS96109 COM(96)0170 C4-0334/96 + ENVI Fond R OLSSON Karl-Erik. (ELD) (PE219.875 ) - Consideration of draft report 7. EU mandate on climate change for COP III (UN Framework Convention on Climate Change - 3rd Conference of the Parties) - discussion ahead of December Environm ent Council - Oral report by Mr SPENCER ===] Wednesday, 20 November 1996, 9.00am 7.2 PUBLIC HEARING - - "CLEAN FUEL FOR CLEAN CARS?" (Eisma, Lange, Mamere) - see program (PE219.416 ) ===] Wednesday, 20 November 1996, 3.00pm 7.4 PUBLIC HEARING - - "CLEAN FUEL FOR CLEAN CARS?" (Eisma, Lange, Mamere) ===] Thursday, 21 November 1996, 9.00am 8. Appointment of rapporteurs and draftsmen - decisions on procedure 9. Bathing waters: adaptation of Directive 76/150/EEC (scientific knowledge) (T02124) **I (T02124) SYN94006 COM(94)0036 C4-0036/94 + ENVI Fond R EISMA Doeke. (ELD) (PE219.109 ) - Adoption of draft report 10. Quality of drinking water intended for human consumption (Directive 80/778) (T02663) **I (T02663) SYN95010 COM(94)0612 C4-0199/95 + ENVI Fond R COLLINS Kenneth D. (PSE) (PE218.671 ) - Adoption of draft report 11. An industrial competitiveness policy for the European chemical industry: a model (T04842) (T04842) COS0422 COM(96)0187 C4-0273/96 + ENVI Avis L (PE219.112 ) F ECON Fond R LANGEN Werner. (PPE) - Adoption of draft opinion 12. Any other business 13. Date of next meeting in Brussels (PE/XI/OJ/96-20 )

[FOOTNOTES]1. ) Coordinators' meeting to be held on Tuesday, 19 November 1996 at 5.30 pm A N N E X ===] Item 8 of the agenda ===] Appointment of rapporteurs and draftsmen - decisions on procedure ===] CONSULTATIONS ===] - Responsible 1. dangerous substances and preparations: restrictions on marketing and use - 1 7th am. directive 76/769/EEC (T05043) (T05043) COD96252 COM(96)0513 C4-0569/96 + ENVI Fond ===] - Opinion 2. The nuclear industries in the EU (Article 40 of the Euratom Treaty) (Commission communication) (T05023) (T05023) COS0470 COM(96)0339 C4-0532/96 + ENVI Avis F ENER Fond 3. Reference laboratories for the monitoring of marine biotoxins (amendment of Decision 93/383/EEC) (T04999) (T04999) CNS96234 COM(96)0464 C4-0547/96 + ENVI Avis F PECH Fond 4. Monitoring of the application of Community Law 1995 (T04922) F JURI Fond R SCHAFFNER Anne-Marie (UPE) (PE216.821 ) 5. 1995 discharge - general budget - Section III (T04845) F CONT Fond - FIN - END OF DOCUMENT.
